H0.text: Plastic is a good conductor of heat.

H1.text: Rubber is a material that is a good conductor of heat.

H2.text: Glass is a good conductor of heat.

H3.text: Copper is a good conductor of heat.

A4.text: Heat sinks and heat exchangers use copper because of its superior heat dissipation properties.

A5.text: Copper has high thermal conductivity, second highest (second only to silver) among pure metals at room temperature.
